draw.basic

Class BoxBlur

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.basic.BoxBlur

  • public class BoxBlur
extends java.lang.Object
    Blur filter sets the value of each pixel to the average value of its neighboring pixels. The filter kernel used here has a cross shape instead of square, the size of the kernel depends on radius.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
